empond.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !     ==================================
00002 !     
00003 !     Electromagnetic fields 
00004 !     
00005 !     - ponderomotive laser model for step-profile
00006 !  returns laser fields at particle position x,y,z relative to critical surface
00007 !     
00008 !     
00009 !     ==================================
00010 
00011 
00012 subroutine empond(t,tpulse,sigma0,a0,w0,x,y,z,ez,by,bx,az,phipon)
00013 
00014   implicit none
00015   real, intent(in) :: t ! time
00016   real, intent(in) :: tpulse ! pulse duration or rise-time
00017   real, intent(in) :: a0 ! quiver strength
00018   real, intent(in) :: sigma0 ! pulse width (1/e)
00019   real, intent(in) :: w0 ! laser frequency
00020   real, intent(in) :: x,y,z ! position to evaluate force; x is distance into target from surface (x_c)
00021 
00022   real, intent(out) :: phipon, ez, by, bx, az ! pond. potential and fields
00023 
00024   real :: tenv, Rpon, dRpon, gamma, sigma, atten, theta
00025   real :: r, pi=3.141592654, phi, chi, phase
00026   real :: k0, lskin, gamma_c, f_helm, g_helm, wp_r, nonc
00027   real :: Z_R  ! Rayleigh length
00028 
00029   !     linear rise
00030 
00031   phase = w0*t
00032   k0=w0
00033   nonc = 1./w0**2 ! density normalised to nc
00034   Tenv = min(1.,t/tpulse) ! time envelope
00035 
00036 
00037   !     Standing wave in vacuum; evanescent in overdense plasma
00038   !    Use standard solution of Helmholtz equation for step profile
00039 
00040   gamma_c = sqrt(1.+4*a0**2/nonc) ! gamma at surface
00041   wp_r = 1./sqrt(gamma_c)
00042   lskin = 1./wp_r   ! Rel. skin depth in EM units
00043 
00044  ! Normalised Rayleigh length k_p Z_R = omega_0/omega_p * (k_p sigma0)^2
00045   Z_R = w0*sigma0**2
00046 
00047   !   Phase factor given by tan(phi) = -k0 * l_s = k0 * c/wp
00048   phi = atan(-1./wp_r)   
00049   r = sqrt(y**2+z**2)
00050 
00051 
00052   if (x <= 0) then
00053      !     vacuum solution
00054      chi = k0*x + phi      ! Vacuum phase 
00055      f_helm = sin(chi)     ! laser 'Ez'
00056      g_helm = cos(chi)     ! laser 'By'
00057      sigma = sigma0*sqrt(1.+abs(x)**2/Z_R**2)  ! Vacuum spot size for Gaussian beam
00058 
00059   else
00060      !   evanescent wave - need Sudan solution here
00061      f_helm = sin(phi)*exp(-x/lskin)        ! laser Ez inside
00062      g_helm = cos(phi)*exp(-x/lskin) ! laser By inside
00063      sigma = sigma0  ! Don't expand spot inside target
00064   endif
00065 
00066 
00067   !  Radial envelope
00068 
00069   theta = pi*r/4./sigma
00070   atten = sigma0/sigma
00071 
00072   if (r <= 2.*sigma .and. r/=0. ) then      
00073      Rpon = atten*cos(theta)
00074      dRpon = -pi*y/4./sigma/r*atten*sin(theta)
00075 
00076   else
00077      Rpon = 0.
00078      dRpon = 0.
00079   endif
00080 
00081   ! reconstruct EM fields (s-pol)
00082 
00083   az = 2*a0     *           f_helm * sin(phase) * Rpon * tenv
00084 
00085   ez = -2*w0*a0 *           f_helm * cos(phase) * Rpon * tenv ! Ez = -dAz/dt
00086   by = -2*k0*a0 *           g_helm * sin(phase) * Rpon * tenv ! By = -dAz/dx
00087   bx =  2*a0 *              f_helm * sin(phase) * dRpon* tenv ! Bx = dAz/dy
00088 
00089   phipon = (2*a0*f_helm*tenv*Rpon)**2
00090 
00091 end subroutine empond
00092
